ygData.subject: Re: Faction Questions  (was: Bathory!)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ive noticed in Najena that even if you kill a skeletoon, your faction with Najena goes down. You are in her realm after all and killing her minions. And in
ygData.messageBody:
Ive noticed in Najena that even if you kill a
skeletoon, your faction with Najena goes down. You are
in her realm after all and killing her minions.
And in Befallen, the only faction i remember getting
was for the Inhabitants of Befallen. I got that
faction hit even if i killed a large rat.


Bathory D'Allatu

--- rich.hitz@... wrote:
> From: rich.hitz@...
>
> I have been in Najena a few times. The last time I
> was
> there my group was masacered after a very short
> distance.
> We didn't even kill anything except skeletons.
> Before that I was alone and only killed the 3 skeles
> at
> the entrance.
> I don't remember seeing any faction adjustments, but
>
> does anyone know for sure with these?
> Also in Befallen, do you only take a faction hit for
>
> killing the Necro NPCs and initiates and named
> undead?
> I have killed 3 or 4 initiates when grouped with a
> fellow guildie. I remember seeing a faction hit for
> The
> Dead. Is that only with the DEs or does that
> include
> all Necros? How do you increase faction with The
> Dead?
> This may also be why the DE Necro quest for
> Lindeal's
> Testimony didn't work for me. Heh.
> Thanks.
>
> --
> Cronik Khaos <Brethren of ill Omen>
> Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
> 15th Season Troll SK
> Bertoxxulous
>
>
>
>
> >From: Countess Bathory D'Allatu
> <countess_bathory_69@...>
> >
> >I also want to see what my faction is before i go
> in
> >there. I made the mistake in Najena by just going
> in
> >there and killing stuff, when my faction was
> Dubious
> >with all but the undead.
>
